original_title: Δεν έμεινε καμιά από τις αδελφές Τατά
overview: One winter afternoon, two siblings visit the grave of their beloved grandmother for the first time. In front of the view of the tomb and the abrupt contact with the loss, the siblings discover, in a snowy landscape, the paradoxical ways in which mourning can be expressed.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: There were none left from the Tata sisters
